00029 #ifndef _DynLib_H__
00030 #define _DynLib_H__
00031 
00032 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00033 
00034 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00035 #    define DYNLIB_HANDLE hInstance
00036 #    define DYNLIB_LOAD( a ) LoadLibraryEx( a, NULL, LOAD_WITH_ALTERED_SEARCH_PATH )
00037 #    define DYNLIB_GETSYM( a, b ) GetProcAddress( a, b )
00038 #    define DYNLIB_UNLOAD( a ) !FreeLibrary( a )
00039 
00040 struct HINSTANCE__;
00041 typedef struct HINSTANCE__* hInstance;
00042 
00043 #elif OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_LINUX
00044 #    define DYNLIB_HANDLE void*
00045 #    define DYNLIB_LOAD( a ) dlopen( a, RTLD_LAZY | RTLD_GLOBAL)
00046 #    define DYNLIB_GETSYM( a, b ) dlsym( a, b )
00047 #    define DYNLIB_UNLOAD( a ) dlclose( a )
00048 
00049 #elif OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_APPLE
00050 #    define DYNLIB_HANDLE CFBundleRef
00051 #    define DYNLIB_LOAD( a ) mac_loadExeBundle( a )
00052 #    define DYNLIB_GETSYM( a, b ) mac_getBundleSym( a, b )
00053 #    define DYNLIB_UNLOAD( a ) mac_unloadExeBundle( a )
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 namespace Ogre {
00057 
00069     class _OgreExport DynLib : public DynLibAlloc
00070     {
00071     protected:
00072         String mName;
00074         String dynlibError(void);
00075     public:
00080         DynLib( const String& name );
00081 
00084         ~DynLib();
00085 
00088         void load();
00091         void unload();
00093         const String& getName(void) const { return mName; }
00094 
00106         void* getSymbol( const String& strName ) const throw();
00107 
00108     protected:
00109 
00111         DYNLIB_HANDLE m_hInst;
00112     };

00114 }
